structure.unit: Assessment And Taxation Of Agricultural And Horticultural Land

law.catch_line: Use Of Valuation, Etc. Procedures To Evade Taxes; Penalties
law.text: Any person using the valuation, assessment and taxation procedures set forth in this chapter for the purposes of evading payment of full and proper taxes shall be subject to a fine of not more than ten thousand dollars or imprisonment for one year or both and to payment to the city or town in which the land is located of an amount equal to three times the amount of taxes so evaded.
